title: Username/Password invalid after update
body: After the recent update i'm unable to log into my main account. It's saying Username/Password invalid and also is not sending password recovery to any emails. Anyone else have this problem?

replies.body: Are you connect to the correct region via the patcher?  If so and you can't access your account, I suggest going over our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) for steps to help recover your account.  Hopefully, that will get you back in!

Connected to the correct region. Account recovery is not sending account confirmation to my email for the selected account. This will be a problem because I have alot of $ and time invest on my main account.
